name: Girls Tennis League
description:
"Girls Tennis League" is a tennis game that restores the movements of professional athletes and adds super power hitting to enrich the elements of the game. The game supports most handle operations on the market. Up to 4 players can play doubles matches on one host.
Game Features:
- Unleash flats, topspins, slices, lobs and volleys with different buttons
- Different stadiums and environments like clay, grass, hard courts or indoor courts.
-Experience different game modes such as Career, Grand Slam Tennis and Online Matchmaking.
- Surprise your opponents by hitting the ball with your skills and turning the game around.
- Play with a variety of different players, each with their own unique style of play.
-Challenge random players in the world in real time.
- Realistic physics engine and cloth engine.
